quoteText: These web beacons, pixel tags and clear gifs help measure the effectiveness of our email campaigns, deliver more relevant content, and manage advertising for Kongregateâ€™s games. They also provide additional functionality to the Platform and help us analyze usage of our Sites more accurately. In many instances, beacons, pixel tags, and clear gifs work in conjunction with cookies to function properly, so declining cookies will impair their functioning.
title: This service requires first-party cookies

tosdr.tldr: Also, it uses web beacons, pixel tags and clear gifs. They need first party cookies.
